io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.dsminformation

クラス BPinfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.dsminformation.BPinfo

  • public class BPinfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information file for computation of back propagation.

    This class is immutable

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • BPinfo

        public BPinfo(Station station,
              java.lang.String outputDir,
              PolynomialStructure structure,
              double tlen,
              int np,
              double[] perturbationPointR,
              HorizontalPosition[] perturbationPosition)
        パラメータ:
        station - Information of station
        outputDir - the name of the write folder
        structure - velocity structure
        tlen - must be a power of 2 / 10 (2n)/10
        np - must be a power of 2 (2n)
        perturbationPointR - will be copied
        perturbationPosition - will be copied
